long_description: Converts column types to strings so that they can be interpreted as categories by functions that used mixed numerical and categorical data.

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: The table containing the input data.
input_tables.description: The table containing the input data.

argument_clauses.name: Columns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the input columns that contain numeric values to be converted to VARCHAR.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the names of the input columns that contain numeric values to convert to VARCHAR.

argument_clauses.name: SequenceInputBy
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the LIST_VECTOR of column(s) that uniquely identifies each row of the input argument INPUT_ARG_NAME. The argument is used to ensure deterministic results for functions which produce results that vary from run to run.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input column(s) that uniquely identify each row of input table. The format is 'input1:c1' where input1 refers to the alias used by the input table that contains such column named c1.
